TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Docking extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies where a chart element, such as a legend or title, will be docked on the chart.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Docking enumeration represents the docking location on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control that an chart element should be docked.
Set the `IsDockedInsideChartArea` property of the relevant chart element to specify whether that element will be docked to the entire chart image or to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>object. The chart area is specified in the [DockedToChartArea](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) property of the chart element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking Bottom = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Docked to the bottom of either the chart image or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking Left = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Docked to the left of either the chart image or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking Right = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Docked to the right of either the chart image or a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Docking Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Docked to the top of either the chart image or a object.
